properties.name: azure.openai.deployment-id
properties.description: Deployment ID of the Azure OpenAI model (e.g., gpt-35-turbo)

properties.name: azure.openai.api-key
properties.description: API key used to authenticate with Azure OpenAI service

properties.name: azure.face.key
properties.description: Azure Cognitive Services Face API key

properties.name: azure.face.endpoint
properties.description: Azure Cognitive Services Face API endpoint URL (e.g., https://<resource>.cognitiveservices.azure.com)
